title: AirportSim
description:
Enjoy many of the accurate in-game tasks developed around documented knowledge and interviews with real-world airport ground handling staff:
Real life Airports Enjoy true-to-life airports which we personally captured and carefully recreated focusing on elements such as ground layouts, plane parking, lines, and gate numbers all matching real life. You can follow real aviation charts to move around Lakeside Bar
Licensed Planes We cooperate closely with plane manufacturers to provide you with a realistic experience of serving the planes. Each of them will have real connection points, door operations , refueling systems, lights, sounds, and general ground procedures during the plane turnaround.
